item.description:
Come join us in Metrowest. We will be trying out the Met Bar & Grill at the Natick Collection. Come join us for food, beverages and conversation. Please keep in mind that reservations are being made. Please RSVP "YES" if you are sure you are joining us. Please arrive on-time as many times restaurants will not seat the group until all members of the party have arrived.

If this event fills and you would like to join us please RSVP "NO" and include the comment add me to the waiting list. I will then try to increase the reservation or add you if space becomes available through cancellations.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the lounge area. Look for me or ask for Meetup.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Natick Mixer
